user_prompt: As a bank customer, I require a modern, user-friendly self-service portal that allows me to efficiently manage my banking needs without visiting physical branches. I need to securely log in using multi-factor authentication and access a personalized dashboard displaying available banking products and services based on my profile and eligibility. The portal must enable me to submit account opening requests and service modifications through streamlined workflows requiring minimal clicks. I expect to receive real-time status updates and email notifications regarding my submitted requests. The system should maintain a comprehensive history of all my interactions while ensuring my sensitive financial data remains secure. The portal must be responsive across various devices, providing a consistent experience whether I access it via desktop, tablet, or mobile phone. I should be able to save incomplete applications and return to them later, with the ability to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface. The solution must integrate seamlessly with the bank's existing core banking system while maintaining its own database to ensure optimal performance and reliability. Role-based access controls must be implemented to ensure I can only view and access services appropriate to my profile and authorization level.

epics.title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication
epics.summary: Implement a secure multi-factor authentication mechanism for customer login.
epics.description: Develop a secure authentication system allowing customers to log in using multiple verification factors, such as password plus OTP, biometrics, or authenticator apps. The system should ensure compliance with banking security standards and safeguard sensitive credentials. It must feature account lockout policies, encryption in transit and at rest, and integration with the bank’s identity management system for centralized user control.

epics.title: Personalized User Dashboard
epics.summary: Design and develop a personalized dashboard for customers displaying relevant products and services.
epics.description: Create a personalized dashboard that dynamically displays customer-specific account details, balances, eligible products, and service shortcuts. The dashboard should fetch data securely via APIs from the core banking system and visually present insights based on user profile and banking behavior. It should allow quick navigation to common features, enhancing overall self-service usability and efficiency.

epics.title: Responsive Front-End Design
epics.summary: Implement a responsive user interface for seamless use across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
epics.description: Develop a web interface using responsive design principles to ensure consistent layout and functionality across multiple device types and screen sizes. Focus on usability, intuitive interactions, and accessibility compliance. Ensure that customers can perform all portal functions efficiently regardless of the device used to access the system.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Enable account opening and service modification through efficient self-service workflows.
epics.description: Implement guided workflows for customers to open new accounts or modify existing services directly through the portal. Workflows should minimize clicks, prefill known information, and support data validation at every step. Connect to the back-office systems for approval, verification, and processing to deliver end-to-end automation and improved turnaround times.

epics.title: Document Upload and Management System
epics.summary: Provide secure document upload and management functionality for customer applications.
epics.description: Develop a secure document management feature allowing customers to upload, view, and manage documents required for account openings or service modifications. Integrate automatic metadata tagging and encryption. Ensure secure file transfer, proper file type validation, and compliance with banking data retention policies. The uploaded documents should be linked to corresponding workflows for smooth verification.

epics.title: Save and Resume Incomplete Applications
epics.summary: Allow customers to save partially completed applications and resume later.
epics.description: Implement functionality for users to save incomplete applications, storing their progress securely on the server. Include auto-save capabilities and session management to prevent data loss in case of timeouts or interruptions. Allow customers to resume their workflows at any time, ensuring continuity and improving completion success rates.

epics.title: Real-Time Request Tracking and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide real-time status tracking and notifications for customer-initiated requests.
epics.description: Create a notification system that provides real-time updates to customers about the progress of their account openings, service modifications, or other requests. Integrate email and in-portal notification channels. Notifications should be triggered by backend events and accurately reflect workflow states. Include user-configurable preferences for message types and frequency.

epics.title: Comprehensive Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain a complete record of all customer activities and transactions within the portal.
epics.description: Design a system to log and display a detailed history of user interactions, transactions, applications, and support requests. Enable advanced filtering and search capabilities for customers to view their history clearly. Ensure the logs are tamper-proof and auditable, supporting both customer transparency and internal regulatory compliance.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Implement granular access controls based on user roles and eligibility.
epics.description: Develop a role-based access control (RBAC) framework that ensures customers only see and access products and services suitable for their roles, profiles, and authorization levels. Link roles to authentication credentials and control feature visibility dynamically. The system must support future expansion for different customer categories without requiring major architectural changes.

epics.title: Core Banking and Database Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the core banking system and a dedicated database layer.
epics.description: Establish integration between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking system using secure APIs, ensuring real-time synchronization of customer and transactional data. Maintain an independent database optimized for portal performance. Implement caching mechanisms, data encryption, and synchronization integrity checks to guarantee accurate and reliable data flow.

epics.title: End-to-End Security and Compliance Implementation
epics.summary: Ensure comprehensive security, compliance, and data protection across all layers of the solution.
epics.description: Implement system-wide security controls, including encryption, intrusion detection, data masking, and regular vulnerability assessments. Ensure compliance with banking standards such as PCI-DSS, GDPR, and regional data protection laws. Deploy monitoring tools for anomaly detection and response, guaranteeing that all data exchanges and storage comply with regulatory requirements.

user_stories.title: Implement multi-factor authentication for customer login
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to use multi-factor authentication for login, so that my account can remain secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The system must support multiple verification factors such as password plus OTP, biometrics, or authenticator apps. Ensure compliance with banking security standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. User must enter password and a second authentication factor
2. Successful login only occurs if both factors are verified
3. Failed attempts must follow account lockout policies
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a registered customer
When the customer logs in with their password and an OTP
Then the system should allow access only if both are correct

user_stories.title: Design a personalized dashboard for customers
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see my relevant account details and services quickly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The dashboard should fetch data securely via APIs. It must display account details, balances, eligible products, and shortcuts.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Display customer-specific account details
2. Show eligible products and services
3. Ensure secure data fetching and presentation
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a logged-in customer
When the customer accesses the dashboard
Then the system should display personalized account details

user_stories.title: Implement responsive design for the user interface
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a responsive design, so that I can use the portal seamlessly across all my devices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The interface must be consistent and functional across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. It should support accessibility standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Provide a consistent layout across devices
2. Ensure usability and intuitive interactions
3. Maintain accessibility compliance
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a customer using any device
When the customer accesses the portal
Then the interface should adapt to the device's screen size

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Enable account opening through guided workflows
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to open new accounts through the portal, so that I can benefit from online self-service.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflows should minimize clicks and support data validation at every step. Connect to back-office systems for verification and processing.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Guided workflow minimizes user effort
2. Prefill known information
3. Validate data at each step and connect to backend systems
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a customer initiating new account opening
When the customer follows the guided workflow
Then the system should validate inputs and complete the process

user_stories.title: Develop secure document upload and management
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to upload and manage documents, so that I can complete my account applications easily.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support file validation, encryption, secure transfer, and metadata tagging. Comply with banking retention policies.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Allow secure upload and management of documents
2. Validate file types and ensure encryption
3. Link documents to corresponding workflows
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a customer uploading a document
When the upload is initiated
Then the system should validate and securely store the document

user_stories.title: Allow customers to save and resume incomplete applications
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to save incomplete applications, so that I can resume them later without data loss.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Include auto-save, secure storage, and session management. Allow resumption of workflows anytime.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Save application progress securely
2. Auto-save at regular intervals
3. Allow resumption from last saved state
user_stories.test_cases:
Given an incomplete application
When the customer saves and logs out
Then the system should allow resumption from the saved state

user_stories.title: Provide real-time status tracking and notifications
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want real-time notifications about my requests, so that I can stay updated on their progress.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integrate email and in-portal notification channels. Ensure notifications are triggered by backend events.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Provide real-time updates for requests
2. Support email and in-portal notifications
3. Allow user-configurable preferences
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a customer request
When the workflow status changes
Then the system should send a notification with the update

user_stories.title: Maintain a complete record of customer activities
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to view my interaction history, so that I can keep track of my activities and transactions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Provide detailed logs with advanced filtering and search. Ensure logs are tamper-proof and auditable.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Log all user interactions and transactions
2. Provide advanced search and filter options
3. Ensure tamper-proof and auditable logs
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a customer viewing their history
When searching or filtering interactions
Then the system should display accurate and complete logs

user_stories.title: Implement granular access controls using RBAC
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want my access to be controlled based on my role, so that I only see relevant features and services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Link roles to credentials and control feature visibility dynamically. Support expansion for different customer categories.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Control access based on user roles
2. Dynamically adjust feature visibility
3. Support future expansions
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a customer with a specific role
When the customer logs in
Then the system should display features relevant to the role

user_stories.title: Integrate the portal with core banking and database
user_stories.description: As a system, I need to integrate with the core banking system, so that I can synchronize customer and transactional data.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Use secure APIs for real-time synchronization. Implement caching, data encryption, and integrity checks.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Establish secure integration with core banking
2. Ensure real-time data synchronization
3. Implement caching and data integrity
user_stories.test_cases:
Given a data synchronization event
When the data changes in the core banking system
Then update the portal in real-time

user_stories.title: Ensure comprehensive security and compliance
user_stories.description: As a system, I need to enforce security and compliance, so that I meet banking standards and protect data.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Include encryption, intrusion detection, data masking, and vulnerability assessments. Comply with standards like PCI-DSS and GDPR.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Implement system-wide security controls
2. Ensure compliance with standards
3. Deploy monitoring tools for anomaly detection
user_stories.test_cases:
Given the compliance audit
When assessing the system security
Then all controls should meet the required standards

architecture_generation.description: The architecture represents a self-service banking portal leveraging Azure cloud services. It includes front-end frameworks, authentication, backend services, databases, integration, security, notifications, real-time updates, and development tools to ensure a secure, reliable, and efficient user experience.

data.label: Custom API/Logic Apps for Core Banking
